traits.name: Telepathic Empathy
description: The flumph can sense the emotional state and hostile intent of creatures within 30 feet.

traits.name: Advanced Telepathy
description: The flumph can communicate telepathically with any creature within 60 feet that understands a language.

traits.name: Companion Bond
description: The flumph acts on its master's initiative. It obeys verbal commands (no action required).
If the master is incapacitated, the flumph prioritizes protection, warning allies, and disrupting hostile creatures.

traits.name: Hovering Body
description: The flumph can hover. While hovering, it ignores nonmagical difficult terrain and does not provoke opportunity attacks from creatures it flies past.
